=== Running on Debian ===

<nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/s/software-center.html|Debian Software Center]]</nowiki> is very old, this is a list of things to be done before considering uploading 4.0 to Debian's repositories.

* package python-piston-mini-client for Debian
* package python-defer for Debian
* check if there will be a debian RnR server, if not, disable the reviews feature
